title: Neysa Perez Crespo, MD
cleaned_text: Dr. Neysa Perez Crespo is a family medicine physician with Orlando Health Physician Associates. She diagnoses and provides care for patients and often develops long-standing relationships with them. As a primary care doctor, she takes a holistic approach in guiding patients to prevent illness, set goals and build healthy, realistic habits. Among the conditions Dr. Perez Crespo treats are: - Diabetes - Chronic illnesses - High-blood pressure - Endocrine disorders - Family wellness Dr. Perez Crespo's Training Dr. Perez Crespo received her medical training at San Juan Bautista School of Medicine in Puerto Rico. She earned her bachelor's degree in general sciences from the University of Puerto Rico, graduating cum laude. She completed her residency in family medicine at St. Luke's University Health Network Sacred Heart Campus in Allentown, Pennsylvania. About Dr. Perez Crespo Dr. Perez Crespo is a member of the American Academy of Family Physicians. Outside of work, she enjoys traveling, music and drawing. She is fluent in both English and Spanish.
